<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>compile</h2>">
 <img loading="lazy" src="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png" alt="模拟过程" srcset="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png?size=small, https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211302285.png?size=large 2x" data-title="compile" style="background: url(/blog/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">模拟过程</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<ul>
<li>最后需要注意初始划分需要考虑不同的<strong>词法单元</strong>。之前的划分按照接受状态和非接受状态进行划分，但是这里需要写词法分析器，所以最后的接收状态对应了不同的词法单元，所以也需要进一步划分为不同的集合。</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>compile</h2>">
 <img loading="lazy" src="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png" alt="特定词法单元" srcset="https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png?size=small, https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://nuthecz.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/file/202410211304789.png?size=large 2x" data-title="compile" style="background: url(/blog/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">特定词法单元</figcaption>
 </figure></p>

item.title: Some about Python
item.author: cz.Tangt@gmail.com (czTang)
item.description:
<p>这里是 python 使用技巧的记录，包括日常使用和数据之间的转换。</p>
<h2 id="基础知识" class="heading-element"><span>基础知识</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9f%ba%e7%a1%80%e7%9f%a5%e8%af%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="字符串" class="heading-element"><span>字符串</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ad%97%e7%ac%a6%e4%b8%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>&quot;&quot;&quot; &quot;&quot;&quot;</code> 可以存储数行字符串</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">str</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;learn python the smart way 2nd edition
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s2">hello word&#34;&#34;&#34;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>使用 <code>enumerate()</code> 可以获得元素的序号</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>str.split</code> 会把字符串划分为一个列表，依照空格进行划分</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">word</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">():</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">word</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>str.splitlines</code> 会把字符串划分为一个列表，依照&quot;\n&quot;进行划分</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">line</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">splitlines</span><span class="p">():</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">startswith</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;hello&#34;</span><span class="p">)):</span> <span class="c1"># startswith </span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 	<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">line</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="函数" class="heading-element"><span>函数</span>
 <a href="#%e5%87%bd%e6%95%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>接收不定长参数，<code>*args</code> 表示参数数目不定，可以看成一个元组，把第一个参数后面的参数当作元组中的元素</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">arg</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">args</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">arg</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">total</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上面的函数不能使用关键词传入参数，要使用关键词 <code>**kwargs</code>，它表示参数数目不定，相当于一个字典，键和值对应于键值对</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">arg</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">value</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">():</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;adding </span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2">=</span><span class="si">%s</span><span class="s2">&#34;</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">arg</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">total</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">value</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">total</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 使用方法如下：</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">foo</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">foo</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;bar&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">z</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>map</code> 方法生成序列，<code>map(aFun, aSeq)</code>，函数 aFun 应用到序列 aSeq 上的每一个元素上，返回一个列表，不管这个序列原来是什么类型。事实上，根据函数参数的多少，map 可以接受多组序列，将其对应的元素作为参数传入函数。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">square</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">a</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">c</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">square</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)))</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="文件读写" class="heading-element"><span>文件读写</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>python 提供安全的 <code>with</code> 来进行文件读写，当 with 块的内容结束后，Python 会自动调用它的 <code>close</code> 方法，确保读写的安全。</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th>模式</th>
 <th>描述</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td><code>r</code> </td>
 <td><strong>只读</strong>。该文件必须已存在。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>r+</code></td>
 <td><strong>可读可写</strong>。该文件必须已存在，写为追加在文件内容末尾。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>rb</code></td>
 <td>表示以二进制方式读取文件。该文件必须已存在。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>w</code></td>
 <td><strong>只写</strong>。打开即默认创建一个新文件，如果文件已存在，则覆盖写（即文件内原始数据会被新写入的数据清空覆盖）。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>w+</code></td>
 <td><strong>写读</strong>。打开创建新文件并写入数据，如果文件已存在，则覆盖写。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>wb</code></td>
 <td>表示以二进制写方式打开，只能写文件， 如果文件不存在，创建该文件；如果文件已存在，则覆盖写。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>a</code></td>
 <td><strong>追加写</strong>。若打开的是已有文件则直接对已有文件操作，若打开文件不存在则创建新文件，只能执行写（追加在后面），不能读。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>a+</code></td>
 <td><strong>追加读写</strong>。打开文件方式与写入方式和<code>a</code>一样，但是可以读。需注意的是你若刚用<code>a+</code>打开一个文件，一般不能直接读取，因为此时光标已经是文件末尾，除非你把光标移动到初始位置或任意非末尾的位置。</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">os</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">remove</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;newfile.txt&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;newfile.txt&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;w+&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">f</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">write</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;hello world: &#39;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="其他" class="heading-element"><span>其他</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bb%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>通过 <code>split</code> 对 &ldquo;,&rdquo; 进行分割，使得一行可以输入多个值。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;,&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">&#34;a = </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">, b = </span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>print</code> 操作，默认每次输入后会换行，控制结尾的参数是 end，设置 end 把 &ldquo;\n&rdquo; 替换成了 &ldquo;//&quot;。同时它一次也可以输出多个内容，默认以空格分隔，这里控制分割的参数就是 sep，修改之后空格变成 &ldquo;//&quot;。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;data&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">end</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;//&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Data&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;whale&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sep</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;//&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="数据转换" class="heading-element"><span>数据转换</span>
 <a href="#%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e8%bd%ac%e6%8d%a2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>这里强制自己使用byte类型，这样可以统一python的不同数据类型</p>
<h3 id="alltobytes" class="heading-element"><span>AllToBytes</span>
 <a href="#alltobytes" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>字符串转化为 <code>bytes</code>，也可以直接在前面加 <code>'b'</code> 来转换</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">string</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Hello World&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">str_byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">string</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;utf-8&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;Hello World&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>二进制字符串转化为 <code>bytes</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">hex_string</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;68 656c6c6f20776f726c64&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 这里空格不会影响结果，但是需要是两个字符(68中间不能加空格)一组</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">hex_byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fromhex</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hex_string</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;hello world&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># list(hex_byte) -&gt; [104, 101, 108, 108, 111, 32, 119, 111, 114, 108, 100]</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>长整型转换为 <code>bytes</code>，小端序方式</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">long_i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6788912312</span> <span class="c1"># 下面就是计算转化为16进制的字节数</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">long_i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">long_i</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bit_length</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">//</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">byteorder</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;little&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;\xb8\x94\xa6\x94\x01&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>十六进制数转化为 <code>bytes</code>，小端序方式</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">hex_int</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mh">0x12345678</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">int_byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hex_int</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">byteorder</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;little&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;xV4\x12&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>整型列表转化为 <code>bytes</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">list_num</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mh">0x12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x34</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x56</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mh">0x78</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">list_byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_num</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;\x124Vx&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>字节列表转化为 <code>bytes</code>，先转化为字符串，再转化</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">str_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;1&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;C&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;E&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;B&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;E&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;0&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;8&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;9&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;7&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;4&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;A&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;9&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;6&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;1&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;C&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;5&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 先转str再转byte</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">str_list</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">encoding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;utf-8&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;1CEBE08974A961C5&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="alltobytes-1" class="heading-element"><span>AllToBytes</span>
 <a href="#alltobytes-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>bytes 转化为字符串</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;Hello World&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte_str</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;utf-8&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; &#39;Hello World&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>bytes 转化为十六进制字符串</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;hello world&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte_hex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">byte</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">hex</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; &#39;68656c6c6f20776f726c64&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>bytes 转化为长整型，小端序</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\xb8\x94\xa6\x94\x01</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">from_bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">byteorder</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;little&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; 6788912312</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>bytes 转化为十六进制整型</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;xV4</span><span class="se">\x12</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">int_num</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">from_bytes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">byteorder</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;little&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; 305419896 0x12345678</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>bytes 转化为整型列表</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\x12</span><span class="s1">4Vx&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">list_num</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; [18, 52, 86, 120]</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>bytes 转化为字符串列表</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">byte</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;1CEBE08974A961C5&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">str_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">&#39;utf-8&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">byte</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; [&#39;1C&#39;, &#39;EB&#39;, &#39;E0&#39;, &#39;89&#39;, &#39;74&#39;, &#39;A9&#39;, &#39;61&#39;, &#39;C5&#39;]</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="其余转换处理" class="heading-element"><span>其余转换处理</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bd%99%e8%bd%ac%e6%8d%a2%e5%a4%84%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>转化为字符串</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">chr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span> 			 <span class="c1"># 将 int 类型的 a 根据其 ascii 码转化为 str 字符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">hex</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>				<span class="c1"># 将 int 类型的 a 转化为其十六进制 str 类型</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span>				<span class="c1"># 将所有类型的 a 按照其本身转化为 str 类型</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">str</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">a</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">decode</span><span class="p">()</span>	<span class="c1"># 将 bytes 类型的 a 转化为 str 类型</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>转化为整型</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># a 为 k 进制数，使用 int 将 k 进制数的 a 转化为十进制数</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># # int(a) 直接将字符 a 转化为 int 类型，此时 a 必须为数字字符，注意：不是转化 为ascii 码，而是转化为数字类型，即值不变，类型改变</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">k</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 将 str 类型的十六进制数 a 转化为 int 类型(这里十六进制需要加上0x)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">eval</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 将字符类型的 a 按其 ascii 码转化为 int 类型</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">ord</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="数据处理" class="heading-element"><span>数据处理</span>
 <a href="#%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e5%a4%84%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>struct</code> 模块可以解决 <code>bytes</code> 和其他二进制数据类型的转换。<code>pack</code> 函数把任意数据类型变成 <code>bytes</code>，<code>unpack</code> 把 <code>bytes</code> 变成相应的数据类型。这里的格式就是(format:str, <em>v1</em>, <em>v2</em>, <em>…</em>)，其中format对于后面的数据进行匹配，然后输出。</p>
<h3 id="pack" class="heading-element"><span>pack</span>
 <a href="#pack" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>pack</code> 函数把任意数据类型变成 <code>bytes</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">struct</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pack</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;&lt;II&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10240099</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1767863401</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; b&#39;\x00\x9c@ci_ti&#39; 如果符合ascii的标准，就直接转化为字符</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="unpack" class="heading-element"><span>unpack</span>
 <a href="#unpack" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>unpack</code> 把 <code>bytes</code> 变成相应的数据类型</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">struct</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unpack</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;&lt;I&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="sa">b</span><span class="s1">&#39;it_i&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># -&gt; (1767863401,) 这里只有一个符合 I 的规则，所以只有一个数据</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="数据格式" class="heading-element"><span>数据格式</span>
 <a href="#%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e6%a0%bc%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>format</code> 参数就是上面使用的描述符，<code>struct</code> 利用它可以指定使用大端序还是小端序来解析或者生成数据</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th>Character</th>
 <th>Byte order</th>
 <th>Size</th>
 <th>Alignment</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td><code>@</code></td>
 <td>native</td>
 <td>native</td>
 <td>native，凑足4个字节</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>=</code></td>
 <td>native</td>
 <td>standard</td>
 <td>none</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>&lt;</code></td>
 <td>little-endian</td>
 <td>standard</td>
 <td>none</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>&gt;</code></td>
 <td>big-endian</td>
 <td>standard</td>
 <td>none</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>!</code></td>
 <td>network(=big-endian)</td>
 <td>standard</td>
 <td>none</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<p>数据格式，用于匹配当前字符的数据</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th>Format</th>
 <th>C Type</th>
 <th>Python type</th>
 <th>Standard size</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td><code>x</code></td>
 <td>pad byte</td>
 <td>no value</td>
 <td></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>c</code></td>
 <td>char</td>
 <td>string of length 1</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>b</code></td>
 <td>signed char</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>B</code></td>
 <td>unsigned char</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>?</code></td>
 <td>_Bool</td>
 <td>bool</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>h</code></td>
 <td>short</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>2</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>H</code></td>
 <td>unsigned short</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>2</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>i</code></td>
 <td>int</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>4</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>I</code></td>
 <td>unsigned int</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>4</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>l</code></td>
 <td>long</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>4</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>L</code></td>
 <td>unsigned long</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>4</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>q</code></td>
 <td>long long</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>8</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>Q</code></td>
 <td>unsigned long long</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>8</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>f</code></td>
 <td>float</td>
 <td>float</td>
 <td>4</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>d</code></td>
 <td>double</td>
 <td>float</td>
 <td>8</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>s</code></td>
 <td>char[]</td>
 <td>string</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>p</code></td>
 <td>char[]</td>
 <td>string</td>
 <td>1</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><code>P</code></td>
 <td>void *</td>
 <td>integer</td>
 <td>0</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
